Synopsis: Edits a release for a repository on GitHub.
Description:
Edits a release for a repository on GitHub.

The Git repo for this module can be found here: http://aka.ms/PowerShellForGitHub
Notes: Requires push access to the repository.
Inputs:
GitHub.Branch
GitHub.Content
GitHub.Event
GitHub.Issue
GitHub.IssueComment
GitHub.Label
GitHub.Milestone
GitHub.PullRequest
GitHub.Project
GitHub.ProjectCard
GitHub.ProjectColumn
GitHub.Release
GitHub.ReleaseAsset
GitHub.Repository

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code: Set-GitHubRelease -OwnerName microsoft -RepositoryName PowerShellForGitHub -Tag 0.12.0 -Body 'Adds core support for Projects'
